sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_entitlement.UACustTblEntitlementDAO</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>DAO class to do CRUD related on ua_cust_tbl_entitlement table</description>
        <name>UACustTblEntitlementDAO</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var UACustTblEntitlementDAO = Class.create();
UACustTblEntitlementDAO.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    insert: function(supportedAllotmentTypes) {
        var uaGR = new GlideRecord(LicensingEngineDBConstants.UA_CUST_TABLE_ENTITLEMENT);
        for (var i = 0; i < supportedAllotmentTypes.length; i++) {
            var query = LicensingEngineDBConstants.ALLOTMENT_TYPE + '=' + supportedAllotmentTypes[i] + '^EQ';
            uaGR.initialize();
            uaGR.addQuery(LicensingEngineDBConstants.NAME, LicensingEngineDBConstants.UA_CUSTOM_TABLE_INVENTORY);
            uaGR.addQuery(LicensingEngineDBConstants.TABLE_NAME_ATTR, LicensingEngineDBConstants.TABLE_NAME);
            uaGR.addQuery(LicensingEngineDBConstants.QUERY, query);
            uaGR.query();
            if (!uaGR.next()) {
                uaGR.setValue(LicensingEngineDBConstants.NAME, LicensingEngineDBConstants.UA_CUSTOM_TABLE_INVENTORY);
                uaGR.setValue(LicensingEngineDBConstants.TABLE_NAME_ATTR, LicensingEngineDBConstants.TABLE_NAME);
                uaGR.setValue(LicensingEngineDBConstants.QUERY, query);
                uaGR.insert();
            }
        }
    },
    type: 'UACustTblEntitlementDAO'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-03-29 19:02:17</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>6ad7b77e433121105f919cd82ab8f259</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>UACustTblEntitlementDAO</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Licensing Engine" source="sn_entitlement">bcadabf277f311109c62f5f3cb5a992a</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Licensing Engine">bcadabf277f311109c62f5f3cb5a992a</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_6ad7b77e433121105f919cd82ab8f259</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-03-29 19:07:15</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
